thread.title: Fed forecast for 2 more rate hikes puts some policy concerns to rest, says Rich Guerrini

title: Fed forecast for 2 more rate hikes puts some policy concerns to rest, says Rich Guerrini
text:
Fed forecast for 2 more rate hikes puts some policy concerns to rest, says Rich Guerrini Wednesday, March 21, 2018 - 05:47 
PNC Investments' CEO also tells Reuters' Fred Katayama why he thinks it's a great time for investors to look into value stocks. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
